4096_WARNING: Генерация 4096-битных ключей шифрования может заставить браузер зависнуть. 4096-битные ключи рекомендованы только для высокопроизводительных компьютеров и не рекомендованы для мобильных устройств.
ACC_CREATION_ERR: При создании аккаунта произошла ошибка. Чтобы просмотреть часто возникающие проблемы и их решения, нажмите здесь.
ADDRESS_INFO_1: Чтобы отправлять и получать почту, добавьте все адреса
ADDRESS_LIMIT_UPSELL: Чтобы добавить больше адресов, или чтобы использовать свой домен, улучшите свой аккаунт.
ALIAS_MODAL_MESSAGE_1: Это будет новый адрес, с которого можно будет отправлять и получать почту.
ALIAS_MODAL_MESSAGE_2: Адреса ProtonMail нельзя удалить (но можно отключить). Это значит, что все созданные адреса будут считаться. Узнайте больше об адресах здесь.
BUG_REPORT_DISCLAIMER: Багрепорты не шифруются - не отправляйте чувствительной информации.
CHECK_YOUR_EMAIL_INFO: Мы отправили код подтверждения на ваш Email для восстановления. Введите его, чтобы продолжить.
CHOOSE_DOMAIN: Это - ваш будущий адрес. Выберите домен из списка.
CLEAR_LOGS_CONFIRMATION: Вы действительно хотите очистить все журналы?
COMPOSER_INFO: Определяет стандартный размер формы ответа. Есть два размера - маленькая форма и большой полноэкранный редактор.
CONDITION_TO_UNSUBSCRIBE: You must unsubscribe before requesting deletion of your account.
CONFIRM_DOWNGRADE_MESSAGE:
This will downgrade your account to a free account.

Please disable all additional addresses prior to downgrading your account. You can manage that inside the addresses tab.

ProtonMail is free software that is supported by donations and paid accounts. Please consider making a donation so we can continue to offer the service for free.
CONTACTS_NO_RESULTS: No results for this search in your contacts list.
CONTACTS_NONE: You have no contacts, you can add contact with the above button 'ADD CONTACT'.
COPYRIGHT: © 2016 ProtonMail.com - Made globally, hosted in Switzerland.
CUSTOM_ADDRESS_INFO: Non-original @protonmail addresses can never be deleted (only disabled). This means that once you create an address it will always count towards your address limit. Custom domain addresses must be disabled before they can be deleted. Custom domain addresses can only be deleted if all messages associated with that address are deleted. Learn more about addresses here.
CUSTOM_THEME_INFO: Custom themes from third-parties can potentially betray your privacy. Only use themes from trusted sources.
CUSTOMIZE_INVOICES_INFO: Enter text that you want to appear on your invoice.
DASH_UPSELL_1: Upgrading to a paid account is the best way to support ProtonMail, but you can also donate any amount.
DASH_UPSELL_2: Your donation helps us support more users and continue to develop ProtonMail as free and open source software.
DECRYPTION_ERROR_INFO: Decryption of this message's encryption content failed.
DELETE_ADDRESS_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete this address?
DELETE_PAYMENT_METHOD_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete this payment method?
DELINQUENT_NOTIFICATION: Your account currently has an overdue invoice. Please pay all unpaid invoices.
DISABLE_ADDRESS_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to disable this address?
DISPLAY_NAME_INFO: This is the 'From' name that people will see when you email them.
DKIM_INFO_1: ProtonMail supports DKIM signing for custom domains! To use DKIM authentication, please add the following TXT record into your DNS for this domain. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.
DKIM_INFO_2: Please add the follow TXT record. Note, DNS records can take several hours to update.
DKIM_INFO_3: Keep this record in your DNS for as long as you want to use DKIM. You can change its Value to off to disable DKIM
DNS_PROPAGATE_MESSAGE: It can take up to a day for DNS changes to update.
DOMAIN_INFO_1: Add a domain that you own to your ProtonMail account.
DONATE_UPSELL: ProtonMail is open source software that protects your privacy and doesn't have ads. Your support is essential for keeping the service running.
DROP_HERE: Drop files here or click to upload
END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_FOR_OUTSIDE: End To End Encrypted For Outside
END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_FOR_OUTSIDE_REPLY: End To End Encrypted For Outside Reply
END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_INTERNAL_MESSAGE: End To End Encrypted Internal Message
ENTERPRISE_UPSELL: For a custom solution, contact our knowledgable entrprise sales team for a quote.
ERROR_WHILE_SAVING: Unable to save your changes, please try again.
EXP_DURATION_INFO: Encrypted messages to non-ProtonMail recipients will expire in 28 days unless a shorter expiration time is set.
EXPIRATION_ERROR: Sorry, this message does not exist or has already expired
FEEDBACK_MODAL_MESSAGE: What do you think of ProtonMail version 3.0?
FEEDBACK_MODAL_THANK_YOU: This will only be shown once. ProtonMail is a global effort. Your feedback is very important in our mission to make encryption available for everyone. Thank You!
GENERATING_KEYS_MESSAGE: We are now generating encryption keys for your account, this may take several minutes and temporarily freeze your browser.
HAS_CODE_BUT_WRONG: Wrong verification code. Please make sure you copied the verification code correctly and try again. It can take up to 1 hour for changes to take affect.
KEEP_MAILBOX_PW_SAFE: Keep this password safe - it cannot be recovered.
KEY_DOWNLOAD_INFO: Download your PGP Keys for use with other PGP compatible services. Only incoming messages in inline OpenPGP format are currently supported.
KEY_WAIT_TIME: This can take a few seconds or a few minutes depending on your device.
LABEL: Label
LABELS_NONE: You have no labels, you can add label with the above button 'ADD LABEL'.
LAYOUT_INFO: ProtonMail supports both column and row layouts for the inbox. Using this setting, it is possible to change between the two layouts.
LOGGING_INFO: You can enable authentication logging to see who and when your account is accessed. We will record the IP address that accesses the account and the time, as well as failed attempts.
LOGIN_PW_DEF: This is used to log you into our system.
LOGIN_RESET_INSTRUCTIONS: We've sent a Verification Token to your Recovery Email. Please enter it below:
MAILBOX_PW_DEF: This is used to encrypt and decrypt your messages. This is private and only you know it.
MAILBOX_PW_WARNING: If you lose your mailbox password, you won't be able to read your emails, we cannot recover this password for you.
MARK_READ_UNREAD: Mark as Read / Mark as Unread
MARK_UNREAD_READ: Mark as Unread / Mark as Read
MESSAGE_LEAVE_WARNING: By leaving now, you will lose what you have written in this email. You can save a draft if you want to come back to it later on.
MOBILE_ONLY_INFO: This page is only available on larger resolution devices. If you are on a  phone, try landscape mode, or visit on a computer instead.
MX_INFO_1: Before you can receive emails for your custom domain addresses at ProtonMail, you need to add the following MX record to your DNS. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.
MX_INFO_2: Please add the following MX record. Note, DNS records can take several hours to update.
MX_INFO_3:
Delete any other MX records or make sure ProtonMail's Priority is the lowest number.

If this domain is currently actively receiving emails, create all used email addresses in Step 3 before changing MX record to ensure a smooth transition.
NAME: Name
NO_METHODS: You have no saved payment methods, you can add a payment method by clicking 'ADD'.
ORG_ADMINS_CANT_ACCESS_MESSAGE: Organization administrators cannot access the messages of private users.
ORGANIZATION_RECOVERY_PW_MESSAGE: Please enter your organization recovery password
PASTE_THEME_CODE_HERE: Paste your CSS code here (limited to 200,000 characters)
PAY_WITH_BITCOIN_INSTRUCTIONS: To pay via Bitcoin or Cash, please email us at contact@protonmail.ch for instructions
PAYPAL_CHANGE_TO_USD: All PayPal orders are charged in US Dollar, click the link to change your subscription to US Dollar.
PAYPAL_LOGIN_MESSAGE: You will need to login to your PayPal account to complete this transaction. We will open a new tab with PayPal for you. If you use any pop-up blockers, please disable them to continue.
PAYPAL_ONLY_ANNUAL: We only accept PayPal for annual subscriptions, click the link to switch to an annual subscription.
PAYPAL_ONLY_USD: We only accept PayPal for annual subscriptions. PayPal is also only accepted for US Dollar plans. Click here to switch to an annual US Dollar subscription.
PLAN_UPGRADE_30SEC: Your account is being updated, this may take up to 30 seconds.
PLAN_UPGRADING_MESSAGE: You're upgrading your account. Once we successfully process payment, we'll immediately upgrade your account. Thanks for choosing to become a paying customer!
READ_UNREAD_POSITION: Choose your prefered button order for marking messages as read / unread.
RECOVERY_EMAIL_DEF: This is used to recover your account if you get locked out or forget your login password.
RECOVERY_EMAIL_INFO: Also used to reset a forgotten password.
RECOVERY_INSTRUCTIONS: We will send a code to your <abbr title='This is the optional email you used when first creating an account. This is the same as your Notification Email that is used for sending alerts about new messages.'>Recovery Email</abbr> to reset your <abbr title='Your Login Password is the first password you enter to enter our secure system. The Mailbox password is your second password and is used to decrypt your messages.'>Login Password</abbr>.
REMOVE_MEMBER_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to remove this user?
RESET_WARNING_1: If you forget your Mailbox Password, you can reset your account but...
RESET_WARNING_2: ALL OF YOUR DATA WILL BE LOST FOREVER!
SAFARI_ATTACHMENT_HEADING: Safari does not fully support downloading encrypted attachments.
SAFARI_ATTACHMENT_MESSAGE:
Your attachments are secure and encrypted, but to download them requires extra work. We recommend using a different web browser such as Chrome or Firefox for a better user experience.

To download attachments in Safari:

  1. Click your attachment once to decrypt it. Once decryption finishes you will see a download arrow icon appear.
  2. Right-click on your attachment and choose 'Download linked file as...'
  3. You will be prompted to save the attachment.
  4. Name your attachment from 'unknown' to the correct name, including the file extension.

For more help please contact us directly: support@protonmail.com
SAFARI_DOWNLOAD_KEY: Safari doesn't support downloading of keys. We are working on a fix for this.
SCREENSHOT_IMGUR_MESSAGE: A screenshot of your current page will be sent to us automatically, so we can help debug your problem! Screenshots are hosted using a 3rd party, public service [imgur].
SECURITY_CONTACT_MESSAGE: Contact us at security@protonmail.com for critical security issues.
SIGNUP_CTA_MESSAGE: Take back your privacy! Creating your free secure email account takes less than 2 minutes in most cases.
SPF_INFO_1: SPF is used to specify who is allowed to send email for the domain so we strongly recommend including ProtonMail in your SPF record. Please add the following TXT record into your DNS. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.
SPF_INFO_2: Please add the following TXT record. Note, DNS records can take several hours to update.
SPF_INFO_3: If you want to keep an existing SPF record, you can just add include:_spf.protonmail.ch to it after the v=spf1. Do not create multiple SPF records.
SUBACCOUNT_INFO: ProtonMail business accounts can create subaccounts which are used by other members of your organization.
SUBJECT: Subject
TERMS_CONDITIONS_AGREEMENT: By clicking Create Account, you agree to abide by ProtonMail's Terms and Conditions.
UNABLE_TO_LOAD_LOGS: Error during the initialization of logs
UNLINK_ADDRESS_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to unlink this address?

UPGRADE_REC_BROWSERS: Use one of these browsers for the best experience during Beta:

UPGRADE_SUPPORT_TITLE: Support ProtonMail by Upgrading to a Paid Account
VERIFICATION_CODE_SENT_MSG:
Verification Code Sent
Please check your email and enter the code below:
VERIFICATION_DID_NOT_SUCCEED: Verification did not succeed, please try again in an hour.
VERIFICATION_INFO_1: For security reasons, we need to verify that you are the owner of your domain. Please add the following code into your DNS. Do not remove it even after successful verification. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.
WELCOME_MODAL_INTRO: You now have an encrypted email account! Below are optional settings you can use to customize your account. You can always find these on your Settings page.
WELCOME_STEP_1_MESSAGE: This short tutorial will show you the main features of your new ProtonMail account. For more information, you can also check out the Welcome email we have sent you. If you ever want to view this tutorial again, you can access it by clicking your username in the upper right corner.
WELCOME_STEP_1_TITLE: Welcome to your new encrypted email account
WELCOME_STEP_2_MESSAGE: ProtonMail allows you to fully customize your inbox experience. By clicking (1) you can quickly switch between two possible layouts. You can set a default layout, set your composer style, adjust button layouts, and even switch themes under Settings --> Appearance (2)
WELCOME_STEP_3_MESSAGE: Labels are a powerful tool to manage your inbox. You can add and remove labels from selected emails by clicking the Label button (1). You can also add, delete, and edit labels by clicking on Label Settings (2).
WELCOME_STEP_4_MESSAGE: If you have questions or need help, please visit our support page to find troubleshooting guides and contact our support team. If you find a bug in ProtonMail, please let us know! You can send us a bug report by clicking Report Bugs (1)
YOU_CAN_PAY_WITH_PAYPAL: It's also possible to donate with PayPal or Bitcoin.
YOUR_NEW_FEATURES_ARE_NOW_AVAILABLE: Your new features are now available
